General.Name: HYUNDAI BIOLAND Co.Ltd
General.Description: HYUNDAI BIOLAND Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells raw materials for cosmetics, nutraceuticals, and regenerative medicines. It offers anti-aging, moisturizing, whitening, skin protection, and other cosmetic ingredients; functional food ingredients and general food raw materials; and active pharmaceutical ingredients. The company was formerly known as SKbioland Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HYUNDAI BIOLAND Co.,Ltd in October 2020. HYUNDAI BIOLAND Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 1995 and is based in Cheongju, South Korea.
